settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDescription: Toggle between dark, light, or system mode; you can also choose a primary color.
settings.languageDescription: Select the language of the aplication.
settings.showHeadingDescription: Enable or disable the main title of the document when previewing.
settings.fontsizeDescription: Adjust the scale of the application.
settings.cursorDescription: Change the mouse cursor to pointer or arrow.
settings.tourDescription: Start a tour through the app to learn how to create a new note.
settings.useBase64Description: Not recommended for performance. Embed images in the DB
settings.exportOnLoadDescription: When this option is enabled, the ability to export the database will appear when the application starts.
settings.initWithDataDescription: When this option is enabled, the database starts with a sample document.

importDB.description: Select or drag and drop a json exported from this app.

message.databaseClearedWithExample: Database deleted and a sample document was created.
message.offlineReady: Application is ready for offline use
message.unsavedChangesDescription: Curent document has changes that are not saved in indexededDb
message.logoutDescription: Are you sure you want to log out? This action will also clean up your device's IndexedDB. Documents will still be saved in DexieCloud.

tour.tutorialDescription: This app is under development. Navigate the tutorial using the arrow keys. You can repeat it from the settings.
tour.documentDescription: You can edit this text field to give it a name you prefer to identify it later.
tour.textEditorDescription: Here you can add rich text, images, videos from a URL, and even YouTube videos.
tour.codeHighlightDescription: This allows you to add beautiful code blocks for 295 languages.
tour.createdDocumentsDescription: Here your documents are stored in your indexedDB. You can pin or mark them as completed.
tour.previewDescription: Toggle between edit and preview mode. Images can be enlarged in preview mode. Videos from URLs can only be played in this mode (for now).
tour.importExportDescription: Save the database in JSON format to import it into another browser.
tour.deleteDocumentDescription: If you want, you can also delete the document directly.
